% Biometric Identifier Entity Table
% Auto-generated from JSON schema

\begin{entitytable}{Biometric Identifier}
\textbf{\field{biometricId}} & string (pattern) & Unique identifier for the biometric \\
\textbf{\field{biometricSignature}} & string & Biometricsignature field value \\
\textbf{\field{captureMethod}} & enum(4 values) & Enumerated value for capturemethod \\
\textbf{\field{captureTimestamp}} & string (date-time) & Capturetimestamp field value \\
\textbf{\field{confidenceScore}} & number (≥0, ≤100) & Pattern matching reliability score (0-100) \\
\textbf{\field{fallbackRequired}} & boolean & True if low confidence requires secondary verification \\
\textbf{\field{traceableUnitId}} & string (pattern) & Foreign key to TraceableUnit entity \\
\field{captureGeographicDataId} & string (pattern) & Foreign key to GeographicData entity for capture location \\
\field{lastUpdated} & string (date-time) & Timestamp of the most recent data update \\
\field{speciesBiometrics} & array<string> & Array of speciesbiometrics values \\
\field{trackingPointId} & string (pattern) & Foreign key to TrackingPoint entity where capture occurred \\
\field{verificationMethod} & enum(4 values) & Method used to verify biometric match \\
\end{entitytable}
